article:
Births
* 469 BC – Aspasia of Miletus, mistress of Pericles of Athens (approximate
  date) (d. c. 406 BC)
* 460 BC ** Democritus of Abdera, Greek philosopher (d. 370 BC) ** Hippocrates
  of Cos, Greek physician (d. 377 BC) ** Thucydides, Greek historian (d. 395 BC)

Deaths
* 469 BC ** Zhou Yuan Wang/Ji Ren, King of the Zhou Dynasty of China **
  Leotychides, king of Sparta (b. c. 545 BC) ** Simonides of Ceos, Greek lyric
  poet (b. c. 556 BC)
* 468 BC – Aristides, Athenian statesman (b. 530 BC)
* 465 BC – Xerxes I, king of Persia (murdered)
* 464 BC – Artabanus of Persia, Regent King for Artaxerxes I
* 461 BC – Ephialtes, leader of the radical democrats, assassinated
* 460 BC ** Epicharmus, Greek poet (b. 550 BC) ** Panini, Hindu Indian
  grammarian (b. 520 BC)

References
